resources.string: Be aware that adding an additional wallet increases complexity. This should only be used by experienced Concordium users who require access to both a file wallet and a seed phrase wallet.
You can now add and remove wallets.

You can have a total of 2 wallets in CryptoX. They can be:\n • 1 file wallet (imported via backup file)\n • 1 seed phrase wallet (newly created or imported via either seed phrase or wallet private key)
You can add a new or existing Concordium seed phrase wallet. After adding it you will be able to switch between your seed phrase wallet and your file wallet. \n

You can add an existing Concordium file wallet. After adding it you will be able to switch between your seed phrase wallet and your file wallet. \n\n Be aware that you can not create new accounts or identities in your file wallet.
